Source.Name: xdg-user-dirs
Source.Summary: Tool to manage well known user directories
Source.Description: xdg-user-dirs is a tool to help manage "well known" user directories like the desktop folder and the music folder. It also handles localization (i.e. translation) of the filenames.

Package.Name: xdg-user-dirs
Package.Summary: Tool to manage well known user directories
Package.Description: xdg-user-dirs is a tool to help manage "well known" user directories like the desktop folder and the music folder. It also handles localization (i.e. translation) of the filenames.
